metadata.title: CVE-2018-11307 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in FasterXML jackson-databind 2.0.0 through 2.9.5.Use of Jackson default typing along with a gadget class from iBatis allowsexfiltration of content. Fixed in 2.7.9.4, 2.8.11.2, and 2.9.6.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11307` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjackson2-databind-java - 2.4.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm2').
